title: [Alert - Armed Suspect]
updates: A 911 caller has reported an unconfirmed incident at 222 Stuyvesant Ave. Police are responding to a report of a man who robbed a person and fled eastbound on Monroe Street. Police are mobilizing additional units in response to a confirmed firearm incident, with the suspect last seen fleeing eastbound on Monroe Street. Radio clips available.

title: [Alert - Stolen Vehicle]
updates: A 911 caller has reported an unconfirmed incident at 175th St & Jamaica Ave. Police have received a report of a man stealing a silver car. Radio clips available.

title: [Alert - Stolen Vehicle]
updates: Incident reported at 20 Dane Pl. Approved by the Citizen community Citizen user video shows emergency vehicles on the scene of a collision involving two cars.

title: Basement Fire
updates: Firefighters have received a report of a fire in a first-floor apartment. A 911 caller has reported an unconfirmed incident at 32-79 32nd St. Radio clips available. A Citizen user shows video footage of first responders on the scene. Firefighters have identified the fire's location in the basement of the building and are actively addressing the situation. Firefighters have two lines in operation and are making progress in controlling the basement fire. Radio clips available. Firefighters continue operations in Queens, with three civilians being evaluated for potential injuries. Staging area has been relocated.

title: Dryer Fire in Basement
updates: A 911 caller has reported an unconfirmed incident at 459 Woodward Ave. Police are responding to a report of a dryer on fire in the basement. Firefighters are on scene using two engines and two trucks to address the basement dryer fire.

title: Odor of Gas in Basement Apartment
updates: A 911 caller has reported an unconfirmed incident at 66-43 Pleasantview St. Firefighters have received a report of an odor of gas in a basement apartment.

title: Group of People Causing Disturbance
updates: A 911 caller has reported an unconfirmed incident at 31st St & 36th Ave. Police have received a report of a group of people causing a disturbance.

title: Smoke Condition in Apartment
updates: A 911 caller has reported an unconfirmed incident at 1806 1st Ave. Firefighters have received a report of a smoke condition in an apartment.

title: Vehicle Collision
updates: Police are responding to a report of a vehicle collision. A 911 caller has reported an unconfirmed incident at 188th St & 69th Ave.

title: Police Activity
updates: A 911 caller has reported an unconfirmed incident at Metropolitan Ave & Pleasantview St. Police are responding to a report of a person who may need assistance.

title: People Stuck in Disabled Elevator
updates: A 911 caller has reported an unconfirmed incident at 100-26 67th Rd. Firefighters are responding to a 911 report of people stuck in a disabled elevator.

title: Woman's Purse Snatched
updates: A 911 caller has reported an unconfirmed incident at 400 E 83rd St. Police have received a report of a woman's purse that was snatched.

title: Fire in Apartment at Ravenswood Houses
updates: A 911 caller has reported an unconfirmed incident at 35-20 24th St. Firefighters are on the scene of a fire in an apartment at the Ravenswood Houses. Firefighters are responding to a reported fire at a bar in Queens, following an earlier apartment fire incident. Firefighters have not found any signs of fire in the reported area after a thorough search. Firefighters have confirmed a kitchen fire at the location and are currently addressing the situation. Firefighters have water on the kitchen fire and are actively working to extinguish it. Radio clips available. Firefighters report the kitchen fire is nearly extinguished, with no occupants found. Current response will be maintained.

title: Odor of Gas in Lobby
updates: A 911 caller has reported an unconfirmed incident at 419 E 82nd St. Firefighters have received a report of an odor of gas in the lobby.

title: People Fighting
updates: A 911 caller has reported an unconfirmed incident at 38th Ave & 31st St. Police have received a report of people fighting.

title: Smoke Condition in Apartment Building
updates: A 911 caller has reported an unconfirmed incident at 106-35 159th St. Police have received a report of smoke in an apartment building. Firefighters have also been notified.

title: Report of Maintenance Hole Fire
updates: Firefighters have received an unconfirmed report of a maintenance hole fire. A 911 caller has reported an unconfirmed incident at 453 Empire Blvd.

title: Report of Person Robbed at Gunpoint
updates: A 911 caller has reported an unconfirmed incident at 83-75 118th St. Police have received a report of a person robbed at gunpoint.

title: Steam From Manhole
updates: Firefighters are responding to a report of a manhole fire. A 911 caller has reported an unconfirmed incident at Steinway St & Broadway. Firefighters have determined the issue is steam from the manhole, not a fire, and have notified the utility company.

title: Report of Shoplifter Displayed Knife
updates: A 911 caller has reported an unconfirmed incident at 1552 Pitkin Ave. Police have received a report of a shoplifter who displayed a knife and stole $100 worth of merchandise.
